persona.name: Ellis
persona.bio: Ellis, a 61-year-old full-time crypto trader, is renowned for their intuitive and independent approach to the volatile world of digital currencies. With expert-level experience, Ellis navigates the complexities of the market with a keen sense for emerging trends, relying on instincts honed over decades of trading. Their self-reliant nature and deep understanding of crypto economics make them a formidable presence in the trading community.
